Namespace ambrosia_web.entity¶

Constructor¶

class ambrosia_web.entity()¶

Methods¶

enrich¶

ambrosia_web.entity.enrich(el)¶
Arguments:
  • el (object) – the deserialized data

Receives an object containing the deserialized data from the server and returns an instance of the class ambrosia_web.entity.Entity()

Attributes¶

onSelectHandler¶

onSelectHandler¶

contains all handlers for selecting entities. Any part of the application may listen to those events (i.e. add a function to this array). If the user select an entity the interface can adapt to this (e.g. the ambrosia_web.view.entityview.EntityView() shows details about this entity).
